page.title: 09RESERVOIRS-WORK AND PLEASURE
page.content:
{Yorkshire Water Authority}controls and maintains (a)two supply reservoirs,{ {Stubden},(10 acres) and{Thornton Moor} (45 acres), both providing water for Bradford; and (b) two compensation reservoirs,{Doe Park}(20 acres) and{ {Leeming}(19 acres, half in this block)
{Bradford City Angling Association}has fishing rights on both compensation reservoirs, and also day tickets may be purchased from the council by anyone Monday to Friday.{Leeming}is stocked with{trout}only, but{Doe Park {has a}great variety of fish. {Doe Park}is the only municipal{sailing centre in this part of Yorkshire and Bradford Recreation Department run sailing classes during the week. Weekend use is for private sailing clubs. 10,000 people sail the reservoir in summer.
